episodes.title: Hollywood Actress Escapes Scientology Cult w/ Joy Villa Lifsey
episodes.description:
Joy Villa endured trauma as a child and later was thrusts into the Hollywood industry only to endure more darkness. She found her self trapped in the notorious Hollywood Scientology Cult. Her deliverance testimony is powerful! 

Keep up with Joy
